name: Mage Dungeon Crawler
description:
Prototype of a Dungeon Crawler with endless map possibilities.

Can adjust Spawn rate enemy, size of rooms, culling, and so on.

Procedural generation for collectibles/Enemies/traps through the level.

 Here is a simple Menu level to try out controls and one example level with only 3 rooms

Handle Mouse/Keyboard or Gamepad controller.

Controls are shown in opening level, hold Interact to activate trigger, hitbox can be cheesy, and light isn't done on example level.

Have Fun.

/!\ Prototype is not optimized, and run only in BP. /!\
